title: Online footsoliders: Don’t underestimate the tech that makes your eyes glaze over - DTNEXT
content: Online footsoliders: Don’t underestimate the tech that makes your eyes glaze over  DTNEXT
description: A lot of technology designed for businesses stinks or is stuck in the past, but it’s the nuts and bolts of everything. Companies that make dull technology for organisations will probably last longer than the dozens of Doritos-on-demand start-ups. And it’s a gold mine.
